# --- OS Generated Files (Junk) ---
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# --- Logs & Debugging ---
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# --- Dependencies (Future Proofing) ---
# Even though you use CDNs now, if you switch to Node later, this saves you.
node_modules/
dist/
build/

# --- IDE/Editor Settings ---
# Keep your personal editor settings out of the shared code.
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# --- Environment Variables ---
# CRITICAL: Never upload API keys or secrets.
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# --- ESP32 / Arduino Specific (Just in case) ---
# If you ever drop firmware files in here, this keeps it clean.
*.bin
*.elf
*.hex
*.map
output/
